content.en: Drug discovery: Scientists are using algorithms to find potential drugs that can inhibit the main protease of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, which is crucial for its replication. These algorithms include consensus docking, drug repositioning, accelerated free energy perturbation-based virtual screening, pharmacoinformatics study, integrated drug-repurposing strategy, molecular docking, fragment-based pharmacophore model, molecular dynamics simulation, virtual screening, ADMET prediction, hierarchical virtual screening, de novo drug design developed by artificial intelligence, in silico ADMET studies, drug repurposing, and interaction-based drug repositioning algorithm. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers hope to discover efficient inhibitors of the virus and potentially develop new treatments for COVID-19.
content.da: Lægemiddelopdagelse: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at finde potentielle lægemidler, der kan hæmme hovedproteasen af SARS-CoV-2-virussen, hvilket er afgørende for dens replikation. Disse algoritmer inkluderer konsensusdocking, lægemiddelrepurponering, accelereret fri energi-perturbation-baseret virtuel screening, farmakoinformatikstudie, integreret lægemiddel-repurponering strategi, molekylær docking, fragment-baseret farmakofor model, molekylærdynamiksimulering, virtuel screening, ADMET forudsigelse, hierarkisk virtuel screening, de novo lægemiddeldesign udviklet af kunstig intelligens, in silico ADMET studier, lægemiddelrepurponering og interaktionsbaseret lægemiddelrepurponering algoritme. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer håber forskere at opdage effektive hæmmere af virussen og potentielt udvikle nye behandlinger for COVID-19.
